lead_paragraph: Manager Roy Hodgson has assured captain Wayne Rooney of a place in the 23-man England squad for the Euro 2016 in France, but has refused to guarantee the Manchester United forward a starting berth for the June-July tournament.

headline.print_headline: Rooney May Have to Settle for a Place on Bench in France
headline.main: Rooney May Have to Settle for a Place on Bench in France

snippet: Manager Roy Hodgson has assured captain Wayne Rooney of a place in the 23-man England squad for the Euro 2016 in France, but has refused to guarantee the Manchester United forward a starting berth for the June-July tournament....
